card.name: Mavren Fein, Dusk Apostle
card.text: Whenever one or more nontoken Vampires you control attack, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

card.name: Star of Extinction
card.text: Destroy target land. Star of Extinction deals 20 damage to each creature and each planeswalker.

card.name: Angrath's Marauders
card.text: If a source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.

card.name: Herald of Secret Streams
card.text: Creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them can't be blocked.

card.name: Shapers' Sanctuary
card.text: Whenever a creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card.

card.name: Verdant Sun's Avatar
card.text: Whenever Verdant Sun's Avatar or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

card.name: Carnage Tyrant
card.text:
Carnage Tyrant can't be countered.
Trample, hexproof

card.name: Waker of the Wilds
card.text: {X}{G}{G}: Put X +1/+1 counters on target land you control. That land becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.

card.name: Ripjaw Raptor
card.text: Enrage — Whenever Ripjaw Raptor is dealt damage, draw a card.

card.name: Kinjalli's Sunwing
card.text: Flying Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Emperor's Vanguard
card.text: Whenever Emperor's Vanguard deals combat damage to a player, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Entrancing Melody
card.text: Gain control of target creature with converted mana cost X.

card.name: Revel in Riches
card.text:
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control ten or more Treasures, you win the game.

card.name: Tishana, Voice of Thunder
card.text:
Tishana, Voice of Thunder's power and toughness are equal to the number of cards in your hand.
You have no maximum hand size.
When Tishana enters the battlefield, draw a card for each creature you control.

card.name: Dire Fleet Ravager
card.text:
Menace, deathtouch
When Dire Fleet Ravager enters the battlefield, each player loses a third of his or her life, rounded up.

card.name: Deeproot Champion
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Deeproot Champion.

card.name: Dreamcaller Siren
card.text:
Flash
Flying
Dreamcaller Siren can only block creatures with flying.
When Dreamcaller Siren enters the battlefield, if you control another Pirate, tap up to two target nonland permanents.

card.name: Goring Ceratops
card.text:
Double strike
Whenever Goring Ceratops attacks, other creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Hostage Taker
card.text: When Hostage Taker enters the battlefield, exile target artifact or creature until Hostage Taker leaves the battlefield. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell.

card.name: Sunpetal Grove
card.text: Sunpetal Grove enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or a Plains. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Ruin Raider
card.text: Raid — At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked with a creature this turn, reveal the top card of your library and put it into your hand. You lose life equal to the card's converted mana cost.

card.name: Rootbound Crag
card.text: Rootbound Crag enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Bloodcrazed Paladin
card.text: Flash Bloodcrazed Paladin enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature that died this turn.

card.name: Captain Lannery Storm
card.text: Haste Whenever Captain Lannery Storm attacks, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.” Whenever you sacrifice a Treasure, Captain Lannery Storm gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Vanquisher's Banner
card.text: As Vanquisher’s Banner enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1. Whenever you cast a creature spell of the chosen type, draw a card.

card.name: Dragonskull Summit
card.text: Dragonskull Summit enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Drowned Catacomb
card.text: Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Glacial Fortress
card.text: Glacial Fortress enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Rowdy Crew
card.text: Trample When Rowdy Crew enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then discard two cards at random. If two cards that share a card type are discarded this way, put two +1/+1 counters on Rowdy Crew.

card.name: Arcane Adapation
card.text: As Arcane Adaptation enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures you control are the chosen type in addition to their other types. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren’t on the battlefield.

card.name: Daring Saboteur
card.text: {2}{U}: Daring Saboteur can’t be blocked this turn. Whenever Daring Saboteur deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

card.name: Sorcerous Spyglass
card.text: As Sorcerous Spyglass enters the battlefield, look at an opponent’s hand, then choose any card name. Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can’t be activated unless their mana abilities.

card.name: Azcanta, the Sunken Ruin
card.text:
(Transforms from Search for Azcanta.) {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. {2}{U}, {T}: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature, nonland card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
(Related: Azcanta, The Sunken Ruin)
